oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of a captured railroad carriage mounted German gun
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A copy photograph showing a long-range German gun mounted on a railroad carriage sitting on a siding with other rail cars. French soldiers and gendarmes are standing on the big gun and on the trackside platform. "CAPTURED/ ---- 4th ARMY" has been painted on the side of the carriage. The gun barrel is elevated about 30 degrees. The faces of the track control signals are marked "RF" indicating that the photo was taken in France.
